entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PolicyEvaluator drops authentication properties when authenticating a single scheme #60506
  • Consider streamlining the "Windows local development validation" pipeline #60504
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #60502
  • Perf regression: json #60501
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #60500
  • ISOPlus OAuth implement. #60497
  • [Blazor] Persisting circuit state for Blazor applications #60494
  • Clearing up confusion when using WebApplicationFactory and TestServer #60492
  • [blazor] use UTF8 buffer for blazor JS interop internals instead of C# string #60489

Closed

  • Nuget Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity references 2.3.0 of Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core and resolves to 3.0.0 which is very old #60213
  • QUESTION: RenderTreeBuilder stable/supported? (ASP.NET Community Standup 2/18) #60486
  • First class http patch support #60462
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #60423
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #60488
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #60362
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation, fortunes, json #60397
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #60487
  • "How to enable inheritance in .NET 9.0 OpenAPI?" #60496
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails #60398
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation, fortunes, fortunes #60386
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #60387
  • Perf regression: caching #60412
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, fortunes #60411
  • Generate OpenAPI documents at build-time ignores configured customisations #60463

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Fix ItemsToSign #60507
    area-infrastructure
  • Limit types that get converted to null for empty/null input in NullableConverter #60498
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59483
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix handling for more method signature types #60464
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix for PackAsToolShimRuntimeIdentifiers property in VMR builds #60503
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix ItemsToSign #60505
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Add set up for validations generator #60485
    area-minimal, 10.0-preview2
  • update message for "dotnet dev-cert https --trust" #60149
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix flaky Http2 Trailers tests #60483
    area-networking, 10.0-preview2
  • Quarantine SuppliesCancellationTokenThatSignalsWhenRevalidationLoopIs… #60473
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • Avoid logging bad requests as application errors if the connection was aborted #60359
    area-networking
  • Avoid IISHttpServer close race on construction #60399
    area-networking
  • InputNumber formatting for decimal numbers #60112
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • update area owners #60421
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Update .NET build URLs #60266
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158

Merged

  • Extensions: Add details on "better member" open issue #9157
  • Extensions: Clarify accessibility in metadata format #9130
  • Extensions: clarify naming conventions, capture more open issues #9154

Updated

  • Clarify partial event attribute targets #9150

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffold uses system's comma separator for HasDefaultValue #35654
  • Surprising behaviour using Conventions and EF.Functions #35653

Closed

  • Potential Feature #35655

PullRequests

Created

  • Navigation test refactoring initial work #35652

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vscode MacOs publish IOS error Invalid Binary #27914
  • Resource files generates warnings when comment file is enabled #27911
  • Can't Create Default Android Device #27910
  • Maui ios device theme vice splashscreen background #27909
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #27908
  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27903
  • FATAL EXCEPTION when navigating back MAUI 9.0.40 #27901
  • Picker Cancel Button Not Displayed After Orientation Change in .NET MAUI (Android) #27900
    Backlog
  • System.ArgumentNullException Occurs When Assigning Empty Class Object to ListView ItemSource on Windows Platform #27899
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Inconsistent Picker Popup Layout Rendering in .NET MAUI TimePicker on iOS #27898
    Backlog
  • [IOS] [Mac] Page OnAppearing Is Not Triggered When Navigating Multiple Levels Deep and Returning with PopToRootAsync #27897
    Backlog
  • A Bug with the Android Back Button in 9.x.x versions #27896
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • I7_Pull_to_Refresh - The app hangs after refreshing a few times. #27895
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry hides while keyboard popup on Android. #19819
    Backlog
  • FilePicker returns null when running iOS app on macOS (not Catalyst) #25661
    Backlog
  • FilePicker on MacCatalyst app is not working (occasionally) #15126
    Backlog
  • Random crashes in iOS and Android #27875
  • Unable to set alternate app (Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in Maui Android #27853
  • Picker TextColor switches to default (black) on hover #13418
  • Issue for loading a image from stream in .NET MAUI #27856
  • Issue with iOS App Crashing in Test Flight #27865
  • Page creation results in System.ArgumentException: Argument_AddingDuplicateWithKey, Microsoft.Maui.Controls.BindableProperty #27819
  • CollectionView SelectedItems Two Way Binding doesn't work #23358
    Backlog
  • Android: Native View not set exception on modal page #27841
  • CarouselView crashes on iOS 15.8.3 when using CarouselViewHandler2 #27818
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Can't Change ToolbarItem FontIconSource Glyph After Load #8295
    Backlog
  • When the user closes the Project screen, the voiceover focus is not returning to the Project work card instead, it is landing on the Hamburger icon.:A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Screen reader #27465
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27894
  • How to customize the automation peer for W2DGraphicsView #9460
    Backlog
  • IOS: The specified network password is not correct #27802
  • Unspecific exception and broken Windows platform behavior due to Windows package configuration #26946

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md with net10.0 #27913
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) #27907
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 13 #27904
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Run tests verifying snapshots on mac now that's possible #27893
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Re-enable test Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #27892
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Use newer API in FilePicker #27521
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 5 #27564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 2 #27878
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #27891
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed a crash in CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS 15. #27871
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Toolbar IconImageSource not updating with Binding Changes #27402
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull prevents automatic exception documentation #77281
  • The CompilersPackage is using old setup targets that may be obsolete #77269

Closed

  • Crash when doing override completion in front of an attribute #77193
  • Regression in 17.13: IntroduceVariableCodeRefactoringProvider is broken when using parameterless constructor of target type #77276
  • Nullable Quick Info for `field` uses unspeakable name #77219
  • NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateCSharpTemplateProjects is flakey #74157
    Backlog
  • Flaky test: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects #74827
    Backlog
  • [Infra] Re-enable tests that utilize `DotNetSdkMSBuildInstalled` #67566
    18.0
  • Creating new file does not respect .editorconfig tab setting #22171
    Backlog
  • DocumentId's need a way to indicate that they refer to a SourceGenerated document. #64397
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35818.40 #77268

PullRequests

Created

  • Update debugger contracts to fix hot reload issue #77284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: include receiver parameter in display string #77283
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Partial events and constructors: more tests #77280
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disallow initializers on partial constructor definitions #77275
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Mix the source generator version info into the dependent checksum we get for projects #77273
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow Semantic Search query function to take symbol parameter #77272
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure diagnostics refresh when source generators run in balanced mode #77271
    untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Fix crash in 'introduce variable' when converting an object creation expression to an implicit object creation expression #77279
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix override completion when attribute below #77242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship #77266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix Quick Info nullability display for backing fields #77240
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #76832
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CoreCLR packages are not servicing ready #112710
  • JIT: Unchecked write barriers are emitted for stack allocated arrays #112709
    10.0.0
  • Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension returns full path and filename #112707
  • Add mechanism for host to provide callback for getting assembly data #112706
    10.0.0
  • Imprecise exception message when resolving keyed services. #112702
  • Debug build memory leak leading to OOM crashes in .NET 8 Android, when using OxyPlot PlotView #112701
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.Functional.Tests crash on assert #112700
  • Bounds checks for "a[i] followed by a[j] when j > i" #112694
    Future
  • Addressing mode was not contained #112692
    Future
  • [browser] remove support for build without WASM-EH #112686
    10.0.0
  • AV in System.Threading.Tests failing with JitStress #112683
    10.0.0
  • AV in `Loader/binding/assemblies/generics/arilistienum/methods/exceptions/exceptions.cmd` with OSR stress #112681
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: void-returning Encode callback for AsnWriter #112675
    10.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.InternalRelease Method errors with ObjectDisposedException on MacOS #112674
  • DeflateStream does not return a filled buffer when it hits the end of an inflater block, and BufferedStream doesn't keep requesting until it is full #112673

Closed

  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked failing with System.OverflowException #112286
  • JIT: Inliner direct substitution of return buffers can reorder side effects #112053
    10.0.0
  • Randomly Getting System.IO.IOException: net_io_readfailure, Software caused connection abort #111061
  • Authentication_EmptyCredentials_Fails [FAIL] #112312
  • could you please add Splice method to List<T> #112699
  • `IPAddress.TryParse` return wrong result for `192.168.1` #112685
  • System.Net.Quic.QuicException : Connection aborted by peer #111831
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 x64 on arm mac unable to debug #112156
    10.0.0
  • [illink] Trimmer incorrectly trims interface implementation methods on generic abstract classes #112559
    10.0.0
  • [9.0] Timeout - [Long Running Test] 'Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.LazyLoadingTests.LoadLazyAssemblyBeforeItIsNeeded #107897
    10.0.0
  • [browser/WASM + .NET9] why is the garbage collector still not doing its job? #110100
  • [browser] HttpClientHandlerTest.ReadAsStreamAsync_Cancellation - No exception was thrown #104419
    10.0.0
  • Null ref in JSMarshalerArgument.ToManaged #104470
    10.0.0
  • App-level security policy for certificate revocation check #112145
  • Memory leak when polling ssl endpoint #109600
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger Regression on 2/4/2025 10:16:23 PM +00:00 #112664
  • FATAL_GC_ERROR produces hard to diagnose hangs or crashes #112599
    10.0.0
  • XmlSerializer has different behavior when deserializing an empty XML tag to a collection when `DynamicCodeSupport` is false #107252
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flags in EarlyProp after nullcheck is removed #112717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply "[browser][MT] move wasm MT CI legs to extra-platforms (#112712)" #112716
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove thread pointer from AwareLock #112715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix LINQ handling of iterator.Take(...).Last(...) #112714
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Linq, 9.0.x
  • Bump the minimum ICU version to 60 #112713
    area-System.Globalization
  • Don't emit unchecked write barrier for stack-allocated arrays #112711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove unneeded DiagnosticSource content #112708
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.x
  • [Android] Minimal (and quick) set of changes to make CoreCLR host on Android work #112705
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Testing out r2r tests #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WinHTTP] Remove unnecessary recursion #112698
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • testing CI - GC trace #112696
    area-Build-mono
  • M.E.C.M. Add TryGetValue(ReadOnlySpan<char>) API #112695
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [RISC-V] Use zero register as argument for atomics #112693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build with enabled FEATURE_ENABLE_NO_ADDRESS_SPACE_RANDOMIZATION #112689
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Specialize Contains for Iterators in LINQ #112684
    area-System.Linq
  • [android][coreclr] Make coreclr build specify `HOST_ANDROID` and include Android logging APIs #112677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-android
  • Clean up our runtime-deps packages and enable ARM64 Debs #112671
    area-Setup

Merged

  • Fix path to `dotnet.sh` in `AndroidSampleApp` project #112590
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix `PipeWriter.AsStream(bool)` xmldoc #112669
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Revert "[browser][MT] move wasm MT CI legs to extra-platforms" #112712
    needs-area-label
  • More clean up to debugger attribute tests #112450
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fixed Tensor Conversion Test #112703
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • arm64: Change EQ/NE node to SETCC if the operand supports the zero flag #112235
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move generation of SuggestedBindingRedirects.targets to inner build #112494
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources
  • JIT: Remove `LclVarDsc::GetArgReg` and `LclVarDsc::GetOtherArgReg` uses #112652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in XmlWriterApiTests.TCFullEndElement #112688
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Update a few stresslogs for the frame identifiers #112555
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move generation of SuggestedBindingRedirects.targets to inner build #112487
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 9.0.4
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always track the context for late devirt #112396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: array allocation fixes #112676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LINQ handling of iterator.Take(...).Last(...) #112680
    area-System.Linq
  • [H/3] Fix test closing connection too fast #112691
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] move wasm MT CI legs to extra-platforms #112690
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use `Compiler::compFloatingPointUsed` to check if FP kills are needed #112668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix a typo within PR#112166. #112672
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix new EH hang on DebugBreak #112640
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Use encode callback instead of renting a buffer to write to in DSAKeyFormatHelper #112638
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Move some links to other doc #112574
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix case-insensitive JSON deserialization of enum member names #112057
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.3
  • Reflection-based XmlSerializer - Deserialize empty collections and allow for sub-types in collection items. #111723
    area-Serialization, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use `fgCalledCount` for OSR method entry weight #112662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • JIT: Replace `fgMoveHotJumps` with 3-opt utility #112016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift language features] Support properties using parents type generic parameter #3013
  • [RuntimeAsync] Remove JitOptimizeAwait knob (or make checked), eventually. #3012
  • [RuntimeAsync] Implement struct async thunks. #3011

Closed

  • [Swift language features] Implement `Foundation.Data` in C# #2992
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove CGroup initialization code from the startup path on WASM #2947

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Swift language features] Implement `Foundation.Data` wrapper for the `CryptoKit` in C# #3000
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Propagate cmake warnings and fix existing warnings #3004
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Initialize bound generics handling #3003
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift shipping] Setup MacCatalyst tests on the CI #2998
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Implement a change in IL API to use RuntimeHelpers.Await<T>(Task<T>) and similar helpers. #2951

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApiCompat loading of Roslyn on NETFramework is unreliable #46958
  • native aot cross build failed in linux #46948
  • Dotnet build is not able to map normalized TFMs #46947
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]With 9.0.104 SDK installed on win-x64, Warning "The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.102.1' displays when switch back to loose manifests if workload set version is "9.0.102.1" #46946
  • dotnet publish error when using Sentry sdk #46952
  • It is recommended to add MaxSegmentSize to Socket.SetSocketOption #46930

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly build fails when containing folder has a parenthesis 9.0.200 #46802
  • redist-installer.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package microsoft.netcore.app.crossgen2.linux-s390x. #46943
  • dotnet test --blame-hang - Possible typo in help #46929

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove incorrect text from --blame-hang docs #46942
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update preview branding #46953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove vertical priority list #46741
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Write import map to html files #46233
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Don't restore crossgen packs on unsupported envs #46944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix utility HaveStdErrContainingOnce #46893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for the Feb release #46928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • create rpms that track inner directories for cleanup #44119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2646152 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make DefineStaticWebAssets incremental #46920
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers, Branch Lockdown
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.2xx
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown, 10.0.1xx
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Use the static factory for creating a logger #45009
    untriaged, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 R2R resolve #45236
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun, Branch Lockdown
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [Static web assets] Be more leanient when applying compression negotiation #45598
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • Refactor GetPackageNameFromDependency #45873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Investigate Helix Arm64 timeouts #46243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Do not pass raw messages to string.Format #46479
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.3
